bool convert (  const MC2String &  origname,
const MC2String &  convertFromExt
) 
 

Convert origname file from a convertFromExt.

Parameters:
origname Original filename
convertFromExt Try to convert from this original extension.
Returns:
true on success.

std::auto_ptr< DataBuffer > createPNGFromSVG (  const MC2String &  filename,
int32  width,
int32  height
) 
 

Creates a PNG image with specified size from a SVG.

Setting size to negative value means that the default size of the svg will be used.

Parameters:
filename Load SVG from this file.
width Width in pixels for the return image.
height Height in pixels for the return image.
Returns:
Allocated buffer that contains a PNG file

bool magnify (  const MC2String &  origName,
const MC2String &  destName,
uint32  factor
) 
 

Magnify origname file to destName by a factor.

Parameters:
origName Original filename.
destName Destination filename.
factor The magnification factor, 2 for double original size.
Returns:
true on success.
